name: Grapull
description:
Swing and Pull to victory!

  • bite-size single-player experience
  • use momentum to swing
  • turn on switches, navigate gravity and avoid lasers!

Controls

  • use the MOUSE to aim and shoot your arm by holding the LEFT BUTTON
  • hold the RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to reel yourself closer to the node
  • whilst swinging press SPACE to pull yourself in the direction of the node
  • WASD will give you a very small boost in the given direction when no grappled
  • F to fullscreen
  • T for your speed-runners out there ;D

Game-A-Month-Athon 

This project was created as part of the Ruddy Good GAMA, where we've set out to create a bite-size experimental game each month! Wow look at this, you're early, this is the first game we've created: July 2021.
